faq_question1: How do I hire a freelancer through Fastwork?
faq_question1_step1: 1. Discuss with the freelancer about job details (You will not be charged at this step)
faq_question1_step2: 2. Request the freelancer to send a quotation
faq_question1_step3: 3. Make a payment through the system to confirm job commencement (Your payment is protected by the system)
faq_question1_note: Note: Payments made in the system are protected by Fastwork. See more at Fastwork Guarantee.
faq_question2: How do I hire on behalf of a company?
faq_question2_step1: 1. Provide company information for issuing documents on the 'Hire on behalf of company' page
faq_question2_step3: 3. After approval, immediately inform the freelancer to issue documents via chat
faq_question3_step2: 2. Select chat service to hire (freelancer assistant service)
faq_question3_step3: 3. Provide details to the admin immediately
support_center_description: Need help? We are happy to assist you.
support_center_hours: Monday - Friday 9:30-22:00 / Saturday - Sunday and public holidays 10:00-19:00
call_us_closed: Closed on Saturday - Sunday and public holidays
add_line_title: Let us help you find a freelancer by simply adding Line
add_line_description: Chat service to hire or freelancer assistant
